title: What's in the database?
description: A retrieval-augmented generation pipeline that processes user questions through multiple AI stages to produce informed answers.

assets.label: User Query
assets.description: The original question asked by the user: "What's in the database?"

assets.label: Consume
assets.title: Query Validator
assets.description: Receives and validates the user's question, preparing it for the AI pipeline.

assets.label: Consumed
assets.title: Validated Query
assets.description: The user's question after parsing and validation, ready for processing.

assets.label: Select
assets.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash
assets.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash - Google's lightweight model optimized for speed. Fast inference with low latency, ideal for quick classification tasks.

assets.label: Select
assets.title: Tool Router
assets.description: Analyzes the query and chooses the best tool to answer it. Selected the knowledge query tool.

assets.label: Select
assets.title: Tool Selector
assets.description: Uses AI to analyze the question and pick the right tool to answer it.

assets.label: Selected
assets.title: Tool Selection
assets.description: The decision to use the knowledge query tool for answering this question.

assets.label: Retrieve
assets.title: History Lookup
assets.description: Fetches previous messages from the conversation for context.

assets.label: Retrieve
assets.title: History Retriever
assets.description: Looks up previous messages in this conversation for context.

assets.label: Retrieved History
assets.title: Conversation History
assets.description: No previous messages were found - this is the start of a new conversation.

assets.label: Reflect
assets.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash
assets.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash - Google's lightweight model optimized for speed. Cost-effective for high-volume analysis tasks.

assets.label: Reflect
assets.title: Intent Analyzer
assets.description: Examines the query to identify the user's underlying intent and information needs.

assets.label: Reflect
assets.title: Intent Analyzer
assets.description: Analyzes what the user really wants to know beyond the literal question.

assets.label: Reflected
assets.title: User Intent
assets.description: Determined that the user wants to explore and understand the database contents.

assets.label: Plan
assets.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash
assets.description: Gemini 2.5 Flash - Google's lightweight model optimized for speed. Efficient for structured planning and reasoning tasks.

assets.label: Plan
assets.title: Strategy Builder
assets.description: Develops a step-by-step plan for searching and retrieving knowledge.

assets.label: Plan
assets.title: Strategy Planner
assets.description: Creates a strategy for finding the best information to answer the question.

assets.label: Planned
assets.title: Search Strategy
assets.description: The search strategy: query the knowledge base for database content overview.

assets.label: Search
assets.title: Knowledge Search
assets.description: Searches the knowledge base using the planned strategy.

assets.label: Search
assets.title: Knowledge Retriever
assets.description: Searches the knowledge base to find relevant documents and information.

assets.label: Search Results
assets.title: Retrieved Documents
assets.description: Documents and records found in the knowledge base matching the query.

assets.label: Evaluate
assets.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5
assets.description: Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Anthropic's standard-tier model. Balances capability and cost, strong at nuanced evaluation and judgment tasks.

assets.label: Evaluate
assets.title: Relevance Scorer
assets.description: Scores and ranks the retrieved documents based on relevance to the question.

assets.label: Evaluate
assets.title: Relevance Evaluator
assets.description: Uses AI to score and rank retrieved documents by relevance.

assets.label: Evaluated
assets.title: Relevance Rankings
assets.description: The ranked list of documents deemed most useful for answering the question.

assets.label: Generate
assets.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5
assets.description: Claude Sonnet 4.5 - Anthropic's standard-tier model. Excellent at synthesis and natural language generation with nuanced understanding.

assets.label: Generate
assets.title: Response Composer
assets.description: Synthesizes the evaluated information into a coherent, helpful response.

assets.label: Generate
assets.title: Response Generator
assets.description: Uses Claude to synthesize the information into a helpful answer.

assets.label: Generated
assets.title: Generated Answer
assets.description: The complete answer explaining what's in the database - a collection of digital art.

assets.label: Save
assets.title: Response Saver
assets.description: Records the response and its lineage for future reference and auditing.

assets.label: Save
assets.title: Response Archiver
assets.description: Saves the response and records its complete provenance chain.

assets.label: Saved
assets.title: Saved Response
assets.description: The response has been saved to the conversation history for continuity.

claims.label: Claim
claims.description: Cryptographic proof that this response was generated in a secure, tamper-proof environment.
